EmailTemplate.subject: Want Higher Returns for Your Connectivity Investment?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Discover the true benefits of the Connected Aircraft!
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}, What if you can justify and offset your IFC investment with savings in flight operations, fleet management, passenger experience and ground operations? Access to high-speed global connectivity like GX Aviation means access to real-time data that can help improve decision-making. Want to explore how you can reduce inoperative equipment by 35 percent, cut troubleshooting time by up to 25 percent, decrease fuel consumption by up to 5 percent and more with Honeywell’s GoDirect™ services?
READY TO GET CONNECTED? <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally]]>
